origin.icarae_origin.icarae.name: Icarae
origin.icarae_origin.icarae.description: Carnivorous bird people, Icarae fly low to the ground, weaving between and through obstacles to hunt their prey.
power.icarae_origin.wings.name: Wings!
power.icarae_origin.wings.description:
Thanks to your wings, you are capable of powered flight at low-altitudes.

Of course you need to be light-weight to fly fast, so heavy armor slows you down significantly.
power.icarae_origin.hollow_bones.name: Hollow Bones
power.icarae_origin.hollow_bones.descrip:
In order to fly, Icarae had to evolve a hollow bone structure, similar to birds.

This causes them to be much more vulnerable to damage.
